main event: A high school student observed a yellowish object in the sky, possibly a meteor, in Richmond, Texas on May 22.
interesting points: The observation lasted for approximately 12 seconds., The object exhibited erratic maneuvering., The observation was made on a clear night., The object was visible while the observer was looking for meteors., The document was part of Project Blue Book monitoring UFO sightings.
sighted object: a yellowish object in the sky
